about_the_game:
The game is in development and not completed yet, feel free to report to us all bugs and errors!

Welcome to "PlayCOQ: The Coop Defender" – the game where humor meets heroism, and your courage is as big as your $COQ! Dive beak-first into a world where the stakes are high, and the adversaries are plenty. It's not just a game; it's a battle cry for all rooster warriors ready to defend their coop with honor, wit, and a bit of COQy attitude.

In this feathery adventure, you’ll embark on a journey through 30 egg-citing levels, each with its unique challenges and adversaries. From the sneaky "Fox Frenzy" to the explosive "Tank Terminator" showdown, your mission is to peck, cluck, and crow your way to victory. Show those pesky pigs in "Pig Panic" who’s boss, scatter "Haystack Havoc" across the fields, and don't let the "Coyote Clash" catch you off guard!

As "The Coop Defender," your arsenal will be as diverse as the enemies you face. With every level, from "Corn Convoy Crush" to the daring "General's Last Stand," your skills will be tested. Will you rise as the feathered hero the coop needs? Or will you end up as just another chicken crossing the road?

But wait, there's more than just your beak and bravery. "PlayCOQ" is evolving! What starts as a single-player journey to glory will soon expand into a multiplayer battleground where you can show the world how big your $COQ is. Compete against friends or foes in real-time battles to see whose COQ reigns supreme.

And for the visionary poultry enthusiasts, "PlayCOQ" is not just a game; it’s an entrance into the web3 universe. Soon, you'll be able to earn, trade, and show off your $COQ in ways you never imagined. The future is bright, and it’s filled with feathers!

"PlayCOQ: The Coop Defender" is not just about the battles; it’s about the laughs, the strategy, and the sheer joy of showing the world the size of your courage. With hilarious puns, egg-ceptional challenges, and a community of players ready to ruffle some feathers, this game is set to become your new favorite.

So, are you ready to flap your wings, sharpen your beak, and defend the coop with every feather you've got? Now, download "PlayCOQ: The Coop Defender" and let the world hear your battle cluck. It’s time to play, laugh, and let your COQ fight the good fight. Join the flock today and become the hero the coop deserves!

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game features cartoonish, low-poly violence where the player, as a rooster, uses guns and explosives to defeat humanoid animals (foxes, wolves, etc.). There are red blood splashes when characters are shot.

The game also includes suggestive humor, with the title 'PlayCOQ' being a playful reference. The visual style uses a yolk-and-eggwhite design for the lettering, which might insinuate adult themes without any explicit sexual content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple M2 GPU
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: PlayCOQ: The Coop Defender

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT / NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Prove your COQ's might in epic battles to save the coop from numerous foes! The Game is still in development!
